add-device.title: Add VSE device
add-device.tooltip-specific: Specific IP Address will be added to the list. No scan will be performed - it will not be approved by scan if the device can really be found
add-device.tooltip-range: For the whole indicated IP range devices will be added to the list - No scans will be performed - it will not be approved by scan which of the devices can be really found

message.addUnsuccessful: An error occured while adding devices (devices might already be configured):
